#4. Job Details
##Bed Bath & Beyond - Web Analyst
**Responsibilities:**

- Engage with business leaders and stakeholders to uncover needs, challenges, and/or goals while guiding the discovery and understanding of data and analytic opportunities to meet expectations
- Map out project scope, objectives and deliverables including methodology and design recommendations along with setting timelines for completion
- Leverage BBBY and 3rd party data assets to measure & analyze program performance and return-on-investment across several key marketing and business initiatives (e.g., Direct Mail, E-mail, etc) to aid in the development of future strategies
- Perform and manage all end-to-end steps required for analyses including requirements gathering, methodology development, data pulling, data processing, analysis, insight formulation and results communication
- Create final deliverables in a variety of formats (formal papers, PowerPoint, etc.) to summarize completed analysis, best practices or recommendations, and present all findings directly to senior leaders and business stakeholders
- Work with cross-functional teams on the day-to-day execution of analytics projects & initiatives
- Execute appropriate quality control procedures for analysis, reporting & scoring and audit statistical analysis for accuracy
- Support the building of analytical capabilities and solutions (e.g., exploratory data analysis, segmentation, modeling, campaign evaluations, etc) that enable analytics to support the strategic goals of the Company
- Ensure quality and timeliness of deliverables that meet expectations while balancing business needs with the appropriate level of analytical rigor
- Leverage story-telling skills to deliver insights that are clear, concise and actionable
- Experience & Personal Qualities:
- Strong oral and written communication skills that enable personal impact with technical & non-technical stakeholders plus senior-level decision makers
- Organizational, planning and project management skills and ability to effectively manage cross-functional projects
- Positive and Energetic attitude
- Ability to work independently in a dynamic fast paced environment, with minimal supervision
- Always looking to self-develop and improve both business and technical acumen
- Able to receive and provide feedback constructively
- Prior retail analytics experience strongly preferred
- Experience in project management preferred

**Education/Certification:**

- Bachelor's degree in Operations Research, Management Science, Data Science, Statistics, Econometrics, or related field with strong focus on applied statistics and research methodology

**Required Knowledge:**

- Proficiency with SAS, SQL, R, and/or Python
- Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau and Microstrategy Visual Insights a plus
- Knowledge of industry best practices with respect to marketing measurement, data-mining, experimental design, and other statistical techniques
- Advanced Microsoft Excel skills including pivot tables, macros and v-lookups
- Experience in presenting analytics research and insights

**Experience Required:**

- 3-5 years of experience in marketing analytics preferably within the retail industry

##Enterprise Business Solutions Inc - Entry level Business Analyst
**Responsibilities:**

- Define project requirements by identifying project milestones, phases and elements; forming project team; establishing project budget
- Monitor project progress by tracking activity; resolving problems; publishing progress reports; recommending actions
- Maintain user confidence and protect operations by keeping information confidential
- Prepare technical reports by collecting, analyzing and summarizing information and trends
- Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
- Validate resource requirements and develop cost estimate models
- Perform daily, weekly and monthly reviews and analyses of current processes using operational metrics and reports
- Create informative, actionable and repeatable reporting that highlights relevant business trends and opportunities for improvement
- Conduct insightful, adhoc analyses to investigate ongoing or one-time operational issues
